display_name: How noticeable is sleep problem to others
description:
Item from Insomnia Severity Index. (Morin CM, Insomnia, psychological assessment and management. Guilford Press, New York, 1993)[https://www.thoracic.org/members/assemblies/assemblies/srn/questionaires/isi.php]

[Search for all ISI variables within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/stages/variables?search=isi)
domain: 0=not at all interfering, 1=a little, 2=somewhat, 3=much, 4=very much noticable
